Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: asciiString
Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Convert the Data blob to a 7-bit ASCII string when possible

Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: utf8string
Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Convert the Data blob to an UTF-8 string when possible

Enums/HexStringParsingError.html#/s:7Dat.name: illegalCharacters(pattern:index:literal:)
Enums/HexStringParsingError.html#/s:7Dat.abstract: characters do not conform to regex pattern: [a-z][A-Z][0-9].

Enums/Base64/Padding.html#/s:7DataKit6Ba.name: encodedLength(_:lineFeeds:)
Enums/Base64/Padding.html#/s:7DataKit6Ba.abstract: Calculate the bytes needed to encode a given Data blob

Enums/Base64/Mode.html#/s:7DataKit6Base6.name: failOnInvalidCharacters
Enums/Base64/Mode.html#/s:7DataKit6Base6.abstract: Default: fail when encoded data/string contains invalid characters

Enums/Base64/Mode.html#/s:7DataKit6Base6.name: ignoreWhiteSpaceAndNewline
Enums/Base64/Mode.html#/s:7DataKit6Base6.abstract: Accept newline, whitespace characters to appear between the Base64 encoded chars

Enums/Base64/Mode.html#/s:7DataKit6Base6.name: decodedLength(_:)
Enums/Base64/Mode.html#/s:7DataKit6Base6.abstract: Calculate the number of bytes needed to Base64 decode the given data blob

Enums/Base64.html#/s:7DataKit6Base64O8st.name: standard
Enums/Base64.html#/s:7DataKit6Base64O8st.abstract: Normal Base64 encoding alphabet as per RFC 4648,4

Enums/Base64.html#/s:7DataKit6Base64O7ur.name: urlSafe
Enums/Base64.html#/s:7DataKit6Base64O7ur.abstract: URL and Filename Safe alphabet as per RFC 4648,5
